title: Premium Ecommerce, CMS & News Portal Platform
text: Questions Business Summary Available is a unique offering in the eCommerce/CMS and content delivery market - offering script-based Yahoo and Amazon clone products which can be purchased by customers on a subscription basis and hosted in the cloud, this is an innovative and low-cost alternative to the high-dollar eCommerce back ends/front ends and CMS products requiring lengthy development terms and the need for professionals in coding & graphics development, among other things. Avoiding these costs and pitfalls for the small business and lightweight eCommerce Customer, the company also offers a highly innovative one-click Amazon Clone solution with integrated API and Google Optimization - allowing Amazon users to incrementally add to their income with increased affiliate profits, already seeing increases as high as 267% for the thousands of existing users right now. With growth steady and opportunities for further expansion readily available for this low-overhead and highly automated recurring-revenue platform, we feel confident that this business stands to be one of the most viable opportunities yet in this segment with no direct competitors - in the hands of the eCommerce savvy entrepreneur, this business will most certainly hit the ground running and rapidly expand in the hands of the right buyer.
